text: aur yahood kahate hain ki nasaara ka mazahab kuchh (theek) nahin aur nasaara kahate hain ki yahood ka mazahab kuchh (theek) nahin haalaanki ye donon phareeq kitaabe (khuda) padhate rahate hain isee tarah unheen jaisee baaten vah (musharekeen arab) bhee kiya karate hain jo (khuda ke ehakaam) kuchh nahin jaanate to jis baat mein ye log pade jhagadate hain (duniya mein to tay na hoga) qayaamat ke din khuda unake daramiyaan theek phaisala kar dega
